entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
